name: Incremental Game
description: An incremental game with upgrades and prestige.
image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='150' height='150' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' fill='%23333'/%3E%3Crect x='20' y='20' width='110' height='110' fill='%2300ffff'/%3E%3Crect x='40' y='40' width='70' height='70' fill='%23000000'/%3E%3C/svg%3E
otherInfo: Upgrade your way to the top!

name: N-Body Simulator
description: An interactive n-body simulator to visualize the dynamic interactions of celestial bodies under the gravitational forces
otherInfo: An interactive n-body simulator to visualize the dynamic interactions of celestial bodies under the gravitational forces

name: Text Editor
image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='150' height='150' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' fill='%23333'/%3E%3Crect x='10' y='10' width='130' height='130' fill='%23ff00ff'/%3E%3C/svg%3E
otherInfo: This is a simple text editor.

name: To-Do List
image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='150' height='150' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' fill='%23333'/%3E%3Crect x='20' y='20' width='110' height='110' fill='%2300ff00'/%3E%3C/svg%3E
otherInfo: This is a basic to-do list app.

name: Flipper Game
description: A simple player clicker bird game using WebSockets.
image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='150' height='150' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' fill='%23333'/%3E%3Crect x='20' y='20' width='40' height='60' fill='%23ffff00'/%3E%3Crect x='90' y='20' width='40' height='60' fill='%23000000'/%3E%3C/svg%3E
otherInfo: This game will allow multiple players to play a card game.

name: Platformer Game
description: A 2D platformer game with jumping, running, and basic enemy AI.
image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='150' height='150' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' fill='%23333'/%3E%3Crect x='20' y='80' width='30' height='50' fill='%2300ff00'/%3E%3Crect x='80' y='100' width='30' height='30' fill='%23ff0000'/%3E%3C/svg%3E
otherInfo: This game will feature basic platforming mechanics.

name: Chat Application
description: A real-time chat application using WebSockets.
image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='150' height='150' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' fill='%23333'/%3E%3Cpath d='M20 20h110v80H20z' fill='%2300ffff'/%3E%3Cpath d='M30 30h90v20H30z' fill='%23000000'/%3E%3C/svg%3E
otherInfo: This app will allow users to chat in real-time.

name: Weather App
otherInfo: This is a basic weather app.

name: Solar System
description: An interactive 3D representation of the solar system
otherInfo: A 3D visualization of the solar system uses Three.js for rendering realistic celestial objects, including planets, moons, and the sun, with accurate textures, proportions, and orbital paths. Interactions like displaying details about objects and toggling views are powered by jQuery.

name: Time Management App
description: A task management app with user authentication and task lists.
image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='150' height='150' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' fill='%23333'/%3E%3Crect x='20' y='20' width='110' height='110' fill='%2300ff00'/%3E%3Crect x='40' y='40' width='70' height='70' fill='%23000000'/%3E%3C/svg%3E
otherInfo: This app will help users manage their tasks.

name: Simple Snake Game
description: A classic snake game implemented in JavaScript.
